name: Small Town, Big Secrets
description:
In small town investigator discovers secrets about a herself, her partner, and a cavern of monsters.

'Small Town, Big Secrets' is a visual novel with ~5,500 words, choices, and four endings. There is one fully-illustrated scene (CG).

Themes: mystery with clues, female-female romance, monsters, secrets

Suitable for all ages: wholesome romance, some blood, may be slightly scary themes

Credits:

This game was created in one month for the 2022 Spooktober Jam by Auth and Leaflet Games; concept by Auth and Leaflet Games; art by Auth; writing and programming by Leaflet Games; "Clock Chime, Antique, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org; music in the public domain, acquired from musopen.org.
